search

public int search(java.lang.String term)
Searches for a term. If the term provided matches the last searched term, the last found position is used as a starting point.

Developer note: this method isn't currently used.

Parameters:
term - The string for which to search.
Returns:
The position where the term was found.
If the term is null, empty or not found, -1 is returned.

search

public int search(java.lang.String term,
                  int startPos)
Searches for a term at the given starting position.

Developer note: this method isn't currently used.

Parameters:
term - The string for which to search.
startPos - Where to start.
Returns:
The position where the term was found.
If the term is null, empty or not found, -1 is returned.
